faq_answer3: Yes, we use secure payment methods and do not store your files.

terms_content: This Terms of Service (Terms) governs your access to and use of AI Face Swap services, including any related applications or websites (collectively, the Service). By using our Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not access or use the Service.Our Service allows you to swap faces in videos using artificial intelligence technology. You are responsible for all content you submit to our Service, and you represent and warrant that you have all necessary rights to such content. You agree not to use our Service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose, including but not limited to creating deepfakes that may deceive others or violate anyone's rights.We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to our Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including if you breach these Terms. All provisions of the Terms which by their nature should survive termination shall survive termination, including, without limitation, ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, indemnity and limitations of liability.
privacy_content: At AI Face Swap, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our Service.We collect information that you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, upload content, or contact us. This may include your name, email address, and the content you upload. We also automatically collect certain information about your device and how you interact with our Service.We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our Service, to communicate with you, and to comply with legal obligations. We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information, but no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.Your uploaded content is processed on our secure servers and is automatically deleted after processing and a brief retention period (typically 24 hours). We do not use your content for AI training or share it with third parties.
complaint_content: We strive to provide the best possible service, but we understand that issues may arise. If you are dissatisfied with any aspect of our Service, please follow this complaint procedure:1. Contact our customer support team via the Contact form or email with details of your complaint.2. Include relevant information such as your account details, the specific issue you encountered, any error messages, and the outcome you are seeking.3. Our team will acknowledge your complaint within 48 hours and investigate the issue.4. We aim to resolve all complaints within 7 business days. For more complex issues, we may require additional time and will keep you informed of progress.5. If you are not satisfied with the resolution, you may request to escalate your complaint to a senior manager for review.We take all complaints seriously and use them as an opportunity to improve our Service.
contact_address: 123 AI Innovation Street, San Francisco, CA 94105, USA
payment_canceled_message: Your payment has been canceled. If you have any questions, please contact our support team.
mode_description: Choose between video or image face swap
free_mode_description: Image to image face swap is 100% free

hero.headline: Fast and Secure One-Time Payments
hero.tagline: Experience our seamless checkout process that makes paying online easier than ever before. No friction, just smooth transactions.

demo.title: Demo
demo.heading: See How It Works
demo.description: Our payment system is designed with simplicity in mind. Just a few clicks and you're done - it's that easy!

step1.description: Just select your product, enter your payment details, and confirm. We'll take care of the rest! Our system handles everything securely in the background.

seamless.title: Seamless Experience
seamless.description: Enjoy a smooth checkout process without any redirects or complicated steps. Everything happens right where you are.

secure.title: Bank-Level Security
secure.description: Your data is protected with the latest encryption technology. We never store your sensitive card details.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Complete your purchase in seconds, not minutes. Our optimized system means you'll never be kept waiting.

quality.title: Premium Support
quality.description: Have questions? Our friendly support team is ready to help you 24/7. We're just a message away!

dynamicPricing.title: Pricing
dynamicPricing.heading: Transparent Pricing, No Surprises
dynamicPricing.description: We believe in clear and upfront pricing. What you see is exactly what you pay - no hidden fees or unexpected charges.
dynamicPricing.reassurance: Our secure payment processing ensures your money and data are always protected. Pay with confidence!

q1.question: How secure is your payment system?
q1.answer: Extremely secure! We use bank-level encryption and comply with all PCI-DSS requirements. Your payment information is never stored on our servers, and all transactions are protected with the latest security protocols.

q2.question: Can I get a refund if something goes wrong?
q2.answer: Absolutely! We have a hassle-free refund policy. If you're not satisfied or if there's any issue with your purchase, just reach out to our support team within 30 days and we'll process your refund quickly.

q3.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q3.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and several local payment methods depending on your region. We're constantly adding more payment options to make checkout convenient for everyone!

q4.question: How long does the payment process take?
q4.answer: Most payments are processed instantly! The entire checkout flow typically takes less than a minute to complete. Once your payment is confirmed, you'll immediately receive a confirmation email with all your purchase details.

q5.question: Is my personal information protected?
q5.answer: Your privacy is our priority! We follow strict data protection guidelines and never share your personal information with third parties without your consent. All your data is encrypted and securely stored according to the highest industry standards.

footer.ctaMessage: Join thousands of satisfied customers who've already made the switch to our simple, secure payment system.
